hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Deku Stick#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Nut Capacity#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #a Wallet#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Right Invisible Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Purple Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #2# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #an Ocarina#.
